issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: When a metric has incorrect value the DFSTestUtil.waitForMetric waits 60 sec then throws TimeoutException with thread diagnostic as error message so our asserts will not reached. Please check [^TestJMXGetFails.log] for the error message.
fields.summary: TestJMXGet hides the real error in case of test failure

comments.body: [~kihwal] Could you please review my patch? Since we worked with this test case we would like to clean it up a bit. After that we will have some minor change. Now I just did not want to mix up the clean up changes with this error message issue.

This message was automatically generated.
Thanks for improving the test, [~boky01]. I've committed it to trunk, branch-2 and branch-2.8.

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #9664 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/9664/])
HDFS-10318. TestJMXGet hides the real error in case of test failure. (kihwal: rev 10f0f7851a3255caab775777e8fb6c2781d97062)
* hadoop-hdfs-project/hadoop-hdfs/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/TestJMXGet.java

Thanks for taking care with this [~kihwal]. We will have some really minor change to finish the clean up. As I mentioned earlier we did not want to mix up the bug fix with clean up. Can I ask you to commit once it is finished?
